name: wunfv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(crn(c0)), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(crn(c0)), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(crn(c0)), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(crn(c0), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(crn(c0), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(crn(c0), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c0))))
-| wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c0)))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))

comment: A weak universe is closed under the function value operator. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
